statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{5 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x - 3 , x^{3} - 17 \, x^{2} - 9 \, x - 2 , -3 \, x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x - 1 , 2 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x + 5 , x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - x + 4\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
